# Monad Contract Deployment MCP **DEMO**

![Demo Animation](./public/gif.gif)

Paste the following in the `mcp.json` file

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    ...
    "monad-mcp-sse": {
      "url": "https://https://monad-contract-deployment-mcp.vercel.app/sse"
    }
  }
}
```
